channel.title: Tools & Utilities on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Tools & Utilities on ZooBerry

item.title: Gooey Party Pack
item.description: A colorful pack of Gooeys with bonus features.

item.title: Gooey Party Pack 2
item.description: A follow-up to the original Gooey Party Pack with new Gooeys and extras.

item.title: Gooey Party Pack 3
item.description: The third installment in the Gooey Party Pack series with Marine Mania compatibility.

item.title: Tools and Utilities
item.description: Files or tools that extend game functionality, add features to the player’s benefit, or expand modding capabilities.

item.title: Dependency Master File
item.description: This is a compilation of common dependencies (required downloads) for ZT2 usermade animals.

item.title: EA zBiome Shell
item.description: Extinct Animals zBiome Shell with support for Ambients in User-made Biomes

item.title: Domesticated Status
item.description: Adds support for a “domesticated” status to animals in Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Lego's Revamped Biome System
item.description: This is the second version of the biome system, which allows designers to create biomes with different codenames, instead of using a pre-defined and numbered registry.

item.title: Biome Shell
item.description: Alternatives have been released over the years, but this was the original modified biome system for Zoo Tycoon 2.
